com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features

Interface FeatureClassContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeatureParser, ParserFeatureParser, PosTaggerFeatureParser, SentenceDetectorFeatureParser, TokenPatternMatchFeatureParser

    public interface FeatureClassContainer
    An interface allowing a class to act as a container for name-to-featureClass maps.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFeatureClass(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass)
      Add a feature class mapping for a given name.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFeatureClassDescriptors(java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass)
      Return the descriptors corresponding to a particular feature class.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>> getFeatureClasses(java.lang.String name)
      Return the feature classes currently mapped to the name provided.

    • Method Detail

      • addFeatureClass

        void addFeatureClass(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass)
        Add a feature class mapping for a given name. Note that a name can be mapped to multiple classes, but that only one of these classes at most will be used at runtime. The class used at runtime will be the first class added using addFeatureClass which has a constructor corresponding to the arguments provided.

      • getFeatureClasses

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>> getFeatureClasses(java.lang.String name)
        Return the feature classes currently mapped to the name provided.

      • getFeatureClassDescriptors

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFeatureClassDescriptors(java.lang.Class<? extends Feature> featureClass)
        Return the descriptors corresponding to a particular feature class.
